wikipedia_page.main: Galal Yafai  (Arabic: جلال يافعي; born 11 December 1992) is a British amateur boxer who won gold at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.

response: *Galal Yafai (born 1992), light flyweight gold medal at 2018 Commonwealth Games

Yafai is the son of Yemeni parents. He currently lives in the Moseley area of Birmingham. Yafai has two brothers who are also boxers. Gamal Yafai is a professional boxer and Galal Yafai is an Olympic flyweight boxing champion. https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/olympics/58125750

Gamal Yafai was born in Birmingham, UK, on 4 August 1991 to Yemeni parents. He is the brother of Olympic champion flyweight Galal Yafai and former world professional flyweight champion Kal Yafai. Like them, Yafai was also a member of the Great Britain elite squad.
